<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee Termination">5f918a921b2f9c10f5a3635bbc4bcba9</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d93c28591b492050e7004229bc4bcb0d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set employee number on employee change</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	console.log('newValue typeof = ' + typeof newValue);
	console.log('newValue = ' + newValue);
	userGr.addQuery('sys_id',newValue);
	userGr.query();
	userGr.next();
	console.log(userGr.employee_number);
	g_form.setValue('employee_number', userGr.getDisplayValue('employee_number'));
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-25 21:16:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>aa06d0a31b78dd1062e50ed2cd4bcb81</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set employee number on employee change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Termination Process Core" source="c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64">c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Termination Process Core">c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_aa06d0a31b78dd1062e50ed2cd4bcb81</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-25 21:43:12</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
